item.description:
Everyone,

I am currently planning to host our March meeting in Westford.

Because of the small dining room, I am limiting attendance to 12 people.  In the future, I hope to be able to do more.

I don't have a theme yet, nor a wine theme leader.  There is time, so please volunteer to present a theme to the group.  There are many themes possible.  Not limited to these ideas:

Rhone Ranger wines - California - including GSMs

South America - Chile/Argentina

Another horizontal - maybe Rhone 2010 or some other region

Southern Italian reds

[I'm not working off a list here - it's just what popped up in a conversation with Noel earlier this week.]

Going forward, I want to encourage multiple venues.  Hudson was the geographic center for the group, but without Mike's place we might just have to drive a little more at least this year.  So please think about volunteering to host an upcoming meeting and I will help to coordinate it.

Note:  This meeting is being held one week early because I am traveling on vacation the next week.

Comments and suggestions are always welcome.

 

Charlie
item.name: Please volunteer for a theme - the range of themes is vast!
